description.value: The pulse rate is the number of palpations per minute measured at an artery.

purpose.value: This Observation resource represents the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) PulseRate-v3.3(2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/PulseRate-v3.3(2020EN)).
